title: Rito wtf is that Poppy ulti.

replies.body: Poppy is now the high king of "gtfo outta here"
Im sorry queen*
Wow that's fucking great, just launch the fuckers into outer space.

Yeah I know I was like what are Riot doing when I watched it. *shaking my head*.

I don't know what inspires Riot but they're really not trying to balance the game at all they just create bizarre stupid stuff like this that blows games out of proportion and puts 5 million different problems into the game for Renekton's and Fiora's (Do I want to stay while my 2 nearby allies are blow to Jupiter or should I parry this and stay here solo - decisions decisions) (Should I flash in and tank this ulti by intercepting it as Renekton, knowing I am tank enough or should I just let her blow Teemo off the map for lols) etc.
So basically you are butt hurt that you have to actually put some thought into the game now, rather than just right click gg Fiora op
Nah excited exasperation of "wut r u doen" not a disappointed one :p

The other issue that Poppy will now also face is "Do I?"

Is it even worth using the ult? Does it serve any real purpose other than a team saving ability? You just blow the enemy doing all the damage to kingdom come and save your team from dying, since if you throw an enemy away they are most likely free to survive another day.

If you use the ult as a killing move, which most ults should be used, either to secure a kill or help your team get the kills, than the throwing part is completely useless, it serves nothing more than lols that trolls are going to use it for.

Knock people out of Kindred ulti (This can be used since the knockback heads them towards their base so if you are behind them you can single people out etc and can still be used smartly to knock a few out so Kindred or whoever is left alone and vulnerable, plus it can be used to reset fights to some extent regardless which can beat a team who use their ults to engage and position favourably).

Knockbacks on Morgana's ulting if she has shield down.

Knockbacks on their frontline so your Assassins or whatever can go to work with the frontline CC/defense or whoever or whatever being 3000 units away from helping (situational).

I think it'll be most popular as a defense, to knock back their carries that are winning fights, to knockback their frontline or supports to open up an engage on their carries, as a tower diving tool, after flash to knockback their carries so their frontline has no DPS behind them which can turn fights and as an escape mechanism.

It has a lot of utility, it just seems a bit overkill to have it knock them back 3000 range at max charge since that is pretty game breaking if her kit makes up for this powerful utility.
Alistar can do literally everything you just mentioned, on a much lower cool down

Yeah true. Poppys is a bit more versatile though because she can be out of position and charge it then smack it from a 3v3 side on to knock back the aggressors (1 or 2 of them most likely).

I think she'll be good :P depends how good her kit is though. If she has good scaling with like Trinity force and Youmuu's or something or is a Trinity tank like Irelia who can go a bit more aggressive or a bit more defensive it'll be a strong utility.
I wonder if you can charge flash it and knock them into your fountain. That would be funny as hell!
It knocks them towards their base regardless of where you cast it from, always makes a B line for their spawn.
